metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1686 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - negligible.
metadata.Description: MediaWiki 1.18.0 allows remote attackers to obtain the installation path via vectors related to thumbnail creation.

notes.Note: sbeattie> paths in mediawiki package are known, so there is no additional exposure in ubuntu packages here as of 2021-01-26, this does not appear to have been addressed by upstream

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
